articles.title: Can you find your partner on a stoop in Southie? The creator of Boston’s ‘Stoop Dating’ thinks so.
articles.description:
Stoop Dating has more than 30,000 Instagram followers and more than 40,000 on TikTok.

The post Can you find your partner on a stoop in Southie? The creator of Boston’s ‘Stoop Dating’ thinks so. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Stoop Dating encourages social connections among Boston residents in South Boston.
The initiative has gained over 30,000 Instagram and 40,000 TikTok followers.
Participants may find romantic partners through community engagement on local stoops.
